responses.invalid_email:
Sorry, only Ashoka undergraduates can join the FB group.
If you think this is a mistake, please reply to this email describing the issue.
responses.duplicate_email:
Your email has already been used to sign into the FB group.
If you think this is a mistake, please reply to this email describing the issue.
responses.valid_email:
Here is your code:

[code]

Please copy and paste the entire code at the join prompt on Facebook.
responses.accept_email: This is a confirmation email, confirming that you've joined the Ashoka Undergraduates Facebook group. You can safely ignore this email.
